name: Knights Rush
description:
You can ride on your horseback and defeat the enemy with "rock, paper, scissors".
Kill monsters and bosses guarding the castle and keep running!
How long can you survive in 'Knights Rush'?

[How to play]
1. Tap the Rock, Paper and Scissor on the perfect timing!
2. Tap Rock, Paper and Scissor to the power gauge!

[Game Features]
- Knights Rush for free! Rock, Paper, Scissor battles for free!
- Easy to control, play with one finger!
- Cute 3D characters!
- Various patterns of boss attack!
- Tons of equipments and easy to put on!
- Enjoy the thrilling speed of riding on the horseback!
